title: Hamiltonian Evolution
subtitle: Hamiltonian Evolution for a Water Molecule
description: This notebook demonstrates Classiq's synthesis for Hamiltonian evolution, focusing on depth and CX count for Suzuki-Trotter and qDRIFT product formulas and their controlled versions. The example uses the water molecule Hamiltonian (551 terms, 12 qubits) and compares with Qiskit equivalents.
